code: import{Web3Provider}from"@ethersproject/providers";import{InjectedConnector}from"@web3-react/injected-connector";export var injected=new InjectedConnector({supportedChainIds:[1,3,4,5,42,56,97,137,80001,10,250,42220,43114,42161,31337]});export var getLibrary=function getLibrary(provider){var library=new Web3Provider(provider);library.pollingInterval=8000;return library;};
